titleStmt.title: James F. Robinson, Jr., Receipt to John W. Finnell
CWG13694

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.The State of Kentucky,
To Jno W. Finnell Dr.

row.cell: To amt. paid for dispatches sent Genl Burnside and Pay Master Genl Andrews by order of the Governor while at Camp Nelson Aug 21

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.
Received at Frankfort, the 26 of Aug, 1863, Jas F Robinson Jr Q M G, Quarter-master Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Six -- Dollars and fifty four Cents, in full of the above account.
